thread.section_title: Carflexi Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Carflexi | carflexi.com
thread.title: McNandy

author: McNandy
title: McNandy
text: I used CarFlexi 3 times for 3 separate rentals in Bergamo, Milan. All of the rentals went through perfectly, with no issues encountered at all. There was not much attention drawn to the ~Â£1500 deposit required on credit card from each provider (I saw other customers collecting cards experiencing alarm at this) however this is very clear on the rental agreement, should the customer take the time to actually read it.
